verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וְשָׁלֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years לְיוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחַזְיָ֖הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> began to reign יְהוֹאָחָ֨ז <S%H3059><s%> Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֵה֤וּא <S%H3058><s%> of Jehu עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַ֠יֵּלֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחַ֨ר <S%H310><s%> after that חַטֹּ֜את <S%H2403><s%> the sins יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֛ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֶחֱטִ֥יא <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> which made Israel לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not סָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> he departed מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֞ם <S%H5414><s%> and he delivered בְּיַ֣ד ׀ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand חֲזָאֵ֣ל <S%H2371><s%> of Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וּבְיַ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand בֶּן־ הֲדַ֥ד <S%H1130><s%> of Benhadad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲזָאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> of Hazael כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> all [their] days

וַיְחַ֥ל <S%H2470><s%> besought יְהוֹאָחָ֖ז <S%H3059><s%> And Jehoahaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> unto יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> and to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> how רָאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> him for he saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לַ֣חַץ <S%H3906><s%> the oppression יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how לָחַ֥ץ <S%H3905><s%> oppressed אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> because the king אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> of Syria

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> (And the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel מוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <S%H3467><s%> a saviour וַיֵּ֣צְא֔וּ <S%H3318><s%> so that they went out מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> from under the hand אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians וַיֵּשְׁב֧וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּאָהֳלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H168><s%> in their tents כִּתְמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before that time

אַ֠ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not סָ֜רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Nevertheless they departed מֵחַטֹּ֧אות <S%H2403><s%> not from the sins בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יָרָבְעָ֛ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which [הֶחֱטִי כ] (הֶחֱטִ֥יא <S%H2398><s%> cleanse ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> who made Israel בָּ֣הּ הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [but] walked וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> also הָאֲשֵׁרָ֔ה <S%H842><s%> the grove עָמְדָ֖ה <S%H5975><s%> therein and there remained בְּשֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> Samaria

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not הִשְׁאִ֨יר <S%H7604><s%> Neither did he leave לִיהוֹאָחָ֜ז <S%H3059><s%> to Jehoahaz עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> but fifty פָּֽרָשִׁים֙ <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וַעֲשָׂ֣רָה <S%H6235><s%> and ten רֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand רַגְלִ֑י <S%H7273><s%> footmen כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִבְּדָם֙ <S%H6><s%> had destroyed מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וַיְשִׂמֵ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> them and had made כֶּֽעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> them like the dust לָדֻֽשׁ׃ <S%H1758><s%> by threshing

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts יְהוֹאָחָ֛ז <S%H3059><s%> of Jehoahaz וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that he did וּגְבוּרָת֑וֹ <S%H1369><s%> and his might הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept יְהֽוֹאָחָז֙ <S%H3059><s%> And Jehoahaz עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֖הוּ <S%H6912><s%> and they buried בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> him in Samaria וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> and Joash בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וָשֶׁ֙בַע֙ <S%H7651><s%> and seventh שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years לְיוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> to reign יְהוֹאָ֨שׁ <S%H3060><s%> began Jehoash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹאָחָ֤ז <S%H3059><s%> of Jehoahaz עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיַּֽעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not סָ֗ר <S%H5493><s%> he departed מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּ֞אות <S%H2403><s%> not from all the sins יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֛ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֶחֱטִ֥יא <S%H2398><s%> sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> who made Israel בָּ֥הּ הָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> [but] he walked

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> And the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts יוֹאָשׁ֙ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that he did וּגְב֣וּרָת֔וֹ <S%H1369><s%> and his might אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִלְחַ֔ם <S%H3898><s%> wherewith he fought עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> against אֲמַצְיָ֣ה <S%H558><s%> against Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept יוֹאָשׁ֙ <S%H3101><s%> And Joash עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam יָשַׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֑וֹ <S%H3678><s%> upon his throne וַיִּקָּבֵ֤ר <S%H6912><s%> was buried יוֹאָשׁ֙ <S%H3101><s%> and Joash בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> with the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וֶֽאֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> Now Elisha חָלָ֣ה <S%H2470><s%> was fallen sick אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with חָלְי֔וֹ <S%H2483><s%> of his sickness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> of which יָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> whereof he died בּ֑וֹ וַיֵּ֨רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> and יוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3101><s%> And Joash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֵּ֤בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> unto him and wept עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> over his face וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said אָבִ֣י ׀ <S%H1><s%> O my father אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father רֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> the chariot יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H6571><s%> and the horsemen

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha קַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> unto him Take קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bow וְחִצִּ֑ים <S%H2671><s%> and arrows וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about קֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> unto him bow וְחִצִּֽים׃ <S%H2671><s%> and arrows

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he said לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַרְכֵּ֤ב <S%H7392><s%> Put יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַקֶּ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> upon the bow וַיַּרְכֵּ֖ב <S%H7392><s%> And he put יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put אֱלִישָׁ֛ע <S%H477><s%> [upon it] and Elisha יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> hands הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> upon the king's

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said פְּתַ֧ח <S%H6605><s%> Open הַחַלּ֛וֹן <S%H2474><s%> the window קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> eastward וַיִּפְתָּ֑ח <S%H6605><s%> And he opened וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <S%H477><s%> [it] Then Elisha יְרֵה֙ <S%H3384><s%> Shoot וַיּ֔וֹר <S%H3384><s%> And he shot וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said חֵץ־ <S%H2671><s%> The arrow תְּשׁוּעָ֤ה <S%H8668><s%> deliverance לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וְחֵ֣ץ <S%H2671><s%> and the arrow תְּשׁוּעָ֣ה <S%H8668><s%> of deliverance בַֽאֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> from Syria וְהִכִּיתָ֧ <S%H5221><s%> for thou shalt smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרָ֛ם <S%H758><s%> the Syrians בַּאֲפֵ֖ק <S%H663><s%> in Aphek עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלֵּֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> till thou have consumed
